mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dk_quotation( id, name, member_name, mobile, address, member_id, total_fee, product_type, sale_by, connection_ratio, review_status, review_by, is_review, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{member_name}, #{mobile}, #{address}, #{member_id}, #{total_fee}, #{product_type}, #{sale_by}, #{connection_ratio}, #{review_status}, #{review_by}, #{is_review}, #{remark}, #{create_by}, #{create_date}, #{update_by}, #{update_date}, #{del_flag} )
